Name: EPOS Status
aforza__Description__c: What Access to EPOS Data, may AG Barr get?
aforza__Values__c: 1 - KEY Store Allowing Access to their Data,2 - KEY Store not Allowing Access to their Data,3 - EPOS Store Allowing Access to their Data,4 - EPOS Store not Allowing Access to their Data,5 - No EPOS Data Captured

Name: Food to Go?
aforza__Description__c: Does the DP offer food to go?

Name: Perfect Store Score Eligible
aforza__Description__c: Used for the Visit Template to apply Perfect Store Audits

Name: What are the Outlet's RTM
aforza__Description__c: Where does the DP buy AG Barr brands from?

Name: Call Priority
aforza__Description__c: Telesales Call Priority, based on Order Frequency/Opportunity

Name: Outlet Affiliation
aforza__Description__c: To show if a DP is Affiliated to certain groups

Name: Outlet Type
aforza__Values__c: 1 - Symbol Store (Active),2 - Large Convenience Store - Double Front Store,3 - Small Convenience Store - Single Front Store,4 - CTN (No Alcohol or Frozen Food)

Name: Chiller Size
aforza__Description__c: What chiller does the DP have?

Name: Regions
aforza__Description__c: Which country is the DP in
